title: Alien 3: The Hybrid Cut
description:
by Leonenut
What is it about? This extends Alien 3 to have a version with the extended Assembly Cut scenes but with the dog birth footage instead of the cow. It also restores the Queen bursting out of Ripley.



film name : Alien3: The Hybrid Cut
film studio name : Fox
Date Original Film Was Released : 1992
Date Edit Was Released : Nov 2007
Original Runtime : 114 mins (Theatrical Cut), 145 mins (Assembly Cut)
New Runtime : 147 mins
Amount of time Cut/Added : Complicated !

Cuts removed/added/extended :

* - Retained Ripley being found on the beach
* - Removed Clemens typing up the report on the computer over alternate shots of inside the EEV
* - Added Theatrical cut?s EEV scenes, but cutting out Ripley being found there
* - Theatrical Cut summaries of the EEV crash victims used, along with scene of dog barking at the facehugger
* - Retained scene of Morse and another prisoner with the dead cow and the macho talk of Ripley. Removes Morse discovering the dead facehugger, this is also moved to earlier in the film
* - Restored scene of Morse finding his injured dog
* - Replaced all the cow birth footage with the dog version
* - Restored the song Morse is singing in the tunnel, and calling for his dog
* - Adds back scene with David getting confused about the piston chamber chase
* - Adds back shot of prisoner walking through the tunnels and a shot of 85 wiping the steam off the mirror while he waits for the rescue team
* - replaces Ripley?s demise with the better version of the Queen bursting out of her

Fanedit details (please add here details about DVD contents as well as video and audio information):
2.35:1 NTSC Anamorphic
Dolby Digital 5.1

Your intention for this fanedit:
To have a version with the extended Assembly Cut scenes but with the dog birth footage instead of the cow. Also restoring the Queen bursting out of Ripley.

Time needed for the edition: 3 weeks

persons involved: LeoneNut
